Name: OmniVision Technologies, Inc
Description: DELISTED - OmniVision Technologies, Inc. (OmniVision) designs, develops and markets integrated and semiconductor image-sensor devices. The Company's main products, image-sensing devices, which the Company refers to as CameraChip image sensors, capture an image electronically and is used in a number of consumer and commercial mass-market applications. The Company's CameraChip image sensors are manufactured using the complementary metal oxide semiconductor (CMOS), fabrication process and are single-chip solutions that integrate several distinct functions, including image capture, image processing, color processing, signal conversion and output of a fully processed image or video stream. The Company has also integrated its CameraChip image sensors with wafer-level optics, which the Company refers to as CameraCubeChip imaging devices. The Company's CameraCubeChip imaging device is a small footprint, total camera solution.
